results.content: Some cool concepts I hadn't thought of. The level of instruction was very uneven, sometimes the instructor seemed to speak to absolute beginners, but some more advanced concepts were barely talked about. The volume needs to be normalized. There are a lot of examples and source code is available for every lecture.
